basics.name: Lin Changxing
basics.summary: 硕士研究生，专注于计算机视觉（三维建模、目标检测、语义分割）和机器学习研究。拥有有限元与离散元仿真及嵌入式系统开发经验。导师为华南农业大学工学院杨丹彤教授。

work.summary: Analyzed and reproduced complex simulation cases using ZWDEM and ZW3D software to diagnose functional issues and assist software improvements. Authored comprehensive technical documentation to streamline customer support, improving self-service capabilities for users of ZWDEM software.

Troubleshooted customer technical inquiries and delivered software training sessions, fostering user proficiency with the HyperWorks suite (HyperMesh, HyperView) and EDEM. Proficient in using the HyperWorks series of tools and EDEM for simulation technical support.

work.company: Graduate School of South China Agricultural University

education.institution: Beijing Institute of Technology Zhuhai College

publications.name: A method for detecting the impurity rate of cut sugarcane segments in drone-captured images, based on YOLOv8.
publications.summary: Use Roboflow to calibrate and enhance the data, then perform target detection using an improved YOLOv8 architecture. Integrate the optimized model into the JETSON edge device, design the UI interface and develop a Python-based impurity rate calculation tool.

publications.name: Subsequent supplements
publications.summary: This section includes ongoing research and manuscripts under preparation.

projects.name: Physics Experiment Design Competition (Embedded Systems Group)
projects.summary: Led a 4-person team to engineer an ultrasonic suspension device based on Arduino UNO, achieving stable suspension of small objects via a designed C program.

awards.name: Third Prize in the Asia-Pacific Cup Mathematical Modeling Competition
Third Prize in the Blue Bridge Cup Python Provincial Competition
Second Prize in the Guangdong Provincial Physics Experiment Design Competition
